statements.select:
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY AA.ID DESC) AS RowNo , AA.ID , AA.CreatedOn , AA.CreatedBy , AA.CreatedByName , AA.UpdatedOn , AA.UpdatedBy , AA.UpdatedByName
, AA.Name , AA.Url , AA.ImageType , AA.Width , AA.Height
, M1.Name as ImageTypeName
FROM dbo.TImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IKBase.dbo.TCode M1 WITH (NOLOCK) ON AA.ImageType = M1.Code AND M1.ParentCode = 'ImageType' WHERE 1=1
AND ( AA.Name LIKE '%' + #FindText# + '%' )
ORDER BY RowNo
SELECT AA.* FROM dbo.TImage AA WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE AA.ID = #ID#
statements.insert:
INSERT INTO dbo.TImage ( CreatedOn, CreatedBy, CreatedByName, Name, ImageType, Url, Width, Height ) VALUES ( GetDate(), #CreatedBy#, #CreatedByName#, #Name#, #ImageType#, #Url#, #Width#, #Height# )
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
statements.update:
UPDATE dbo.TImage SET UpdatedOn = GetDate() , UpdatedBy = #UpdatedBy# , UpdatedByName = #UpdatedByName#
, Name = #Name# , ImageType = #ImageType# , Url = #Url# , Width = #Width# , Height = #Height# WHERE ID = #ID#
